humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are three positive lymph nodes out of seven assessed lymph nodes (including the sentinel lymph node). According to the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is metastatic carcinoma present in one sentinel lymph node and two additional lymph nodes out of a total of seven examined. This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N1 (pN1), which indicates cancer has spread to 1-3 axillary lymph nodes.
